question.text: How do I set an initial password?

languages.en: How do I set an initial password?
languages.ms: Bagaimana saya menetapkan kata laluan awal?

detailed.en: "Boss, to set your initial password, please log out of Joker first. Then, on the Joker login page, click â€˜Forgot Passwordâ€™ and follow the steps. Youâ€™ll receive a TAC for verification, and once verified, you can reset it. ğŸ˜Š If you face any issues, feel free to contact Telegram supportâ€”weâ€™ll assist you immediately! ğŸ™"
detailed.ms: "Bos, untuk menetapkan kata laluan awal, sila log keluar dari Joker terlebih dahulu. Kemudian, di laman log masuk Joker, klik â€˜Lupa Kata Laluanâ€™ dan ikuti langkah-langkah yang diberikan. Anda akan menerima TAC untuk pengesahan, dan selepas disahkan, boleh tetapkan semula. ğŸ˜Š Jika ada sebarang masalah, sila hubungi sokongan Telegramâ€”kami akan bantu segera! ğŸ™"

question.text: Boss, do I need to set a PIN right after registering successfully?
variations: Bos, kena set PIN sebaik sahaja berjaya daftar ke?
Boss, do I need to set a PIN right after registering successfully?

languages.en: Is it necessary to set a PIN immediately after registration?
languages.ms: Perlukah saya tetapkan PIN sebaik sahaja pendaftaran berjaya?

detailed.en: "Yes, boss! ğŸ˜Š For your accountâ€™s safety, please set a 6-digit password right after your first successful login!"
detailed.ms: "Ya, bos! ğŸ˜Š Untuk keselamatan akaun anda, sila tetapkan kata laluan 6 digit selepas log masuk pertama kali!"

question.text: Can I share my account with friends?

languages.en: Can I share my account with friends?
languages.ms: Bolehkah saya berkongsi akaun saya dengan kawan-kawan?

detailed.en: "Sorry, boss, this account is strictly for personal use only. Please donâ€™t share it with friends to avoid any security or financial risks! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Maaf, bos, akaun ini hanya untuk kegunaan peribadi sahaja. Sila jangan berkongsi dengan kawan-kawan untuk elakkan risiko keselamatan atau kewangan! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: Can I lend my account to a friend?

languages.en: Can I lend my account to a friend?
languages.ms: Bolehkah saya pinjamkan akaun saya kepada seorang kawan?

detailed.en: "Sorry, boss, for the safety of your personal assets, this account is for your use only. Sharing it could lead to losses, and it might result in your account being frozen! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Maaf, bos, demi keselamatan aset peribadi anda, akaun ini hanya untuk kegunaan anda sahaja. Berkongsi boleh menyebabkan kerugian, dan mungkin akaun anda akan dibekukan! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: Under what circumstances will my account be frozen?

languages.en: Under what circumstances will my account be frozen?
languages.ms: Dalam keadaan apa akaun saya akan dibekukan?

detailed.en: "Boss, if we detect fraud, abnormal betting, or other suspicious activities, the company reserves the right to freeze your account and its balance without prior notice. ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, jika kami kesan penipuan, pertaruhan yang tidak normal, atau aktiviti mencurigakan lain, syarikat berhak membekukan akaun anda dan baki tanpa notis terlebih dahulu. ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: Who is responsible for losses caused by personal mistakes?

languages.en: Who is responsible for losses caused by personal mistakes?
languages.ms: Siapakah yang bertanggungjawab jika berlaku kerugian disebabkan kesilapan peribadi?

detailed.en: "Boss, the company isnâ€™t responsible for losses due to user errors (like betting mistakes or transfer slip-ups). For more details, you can refer to the user guide in the app! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, syarikat tidak bertanggungjawab atas kerugian akibat kesilapan pengguna (seperti kesalahan pertaruhan atau kesilapan pindahan). Untuk maklumat lanjut, boleh rujuk panduan pengguna dalam aplikasi! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: What should I check before making a deposit?

languages.en: What should I check before making a deposit?
languages.ms: Apa yang perlu saya semak sebelum membuat deposit?

detailed.en: "Boss, before making a deposit, please check the payment method firstâ€”the crediting time varies depending on your choice. Also, ensure the bank account details from 4D Joker are the latest, as they may change regularly. If you have any concerns, feel free to let us know anytime! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, sebelum buat deposit, sila semak cara pembayaran duluâ€”masa masuk akaun berbeza mengikut pilihan anda. Pastikan juga maklumat akaun bank dari 4D Joker adalah yang terbaru, sebab ia mungkin kerap berubah. Jika ada sebarang kerisauan, sila beritahu kami bila-bila masa! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: Will the company change its bank account?

languages.en: Will the company change its bank account?
languages.ms: Adakah syarikat akan menukar nombor akaun banknya?

detailed.en: "Boss, to ensure the safety of all members, the company will periodically update its bank accounts. Please confirm the latest bank details before each transfer! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, untuk menjaga keselamatan semua ahli, syarikat akan menukar akaun bank secara berkala. Sila pastikan maklumat bank terkini sebelum setiap pindahan! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: Boss, does the transfer accept IBG (Interbank GIRO)?
variations: Bos, pindahan terima IBG (Interbank GIRO) ke?
Boss, does the transfer accept IBG (Interbank GIRO)?

languages.en: Can I use IBG (Interbank GIRO) for transfers?
languages.ms: Boleh ke guna IBG (Interbank GIRO) untuk pindahan?

detailed.en:
"Boss, we donâ€™t recommend using IBG transfersâ€”it takes 1-3 working days for the bank to process. If itâ€™s not credited after 3 working days, please check with your bank first. 
ğŸ“Œ For further assistance, send the full transaction receipt to live chat, and weâ€™ll help you check! 

Thanks for your patience, boss! ğŸ˜ŠğŸ™"
detailed.ms:
"Bos, kami tidak mengesyorkan penggunaan pindahan IBGâ€”ia memerlukan 1-3 hari bekerja untuk bank memproses. Jika belum masuk selepas 3 hari bekerja, sila semak dengan bank anda terlebih dahulu. 
ğŸ“Œ Untuk bantuan lanjut, hantar resit transaksi lengkap ke live chat, kami akan bantu semak! 

Terima kasih atas kesabaran anda, bos! ğŸ˜ŠğŸ™"

question.text: Can I use interbank transfer for deposits?

languages.en: Can I use interbank transfer for deposits?
languages.ms: Bolehkah saya menggunakan pemindahan antara bank untuk deposit?

detailed.en: "Yes, boss! ğŸ˜Š We recommend using Instant Transfer or DuitNow for deposits, but we advise against using IBG!"
detailed.ms: "Boleh, bos! ğŸ˜Š Kami mengesyorkan penggunaan Pemindahan Segera atau DuitNow untuk deposit, tetapi kami tidak cadangkan guna IBG!"

question.text: Boss, what conditions does the top-up receipt need to meet?
variations: Bos, resit topup kena penuhi syarat apa?
Boss, what conditions does the top-up receipt need to meet?

languages.en: What requirements must the top-up receipt fulfill?
languages.ms: Apa syarat yang resit topup kena penuhi?

detailed.en: "Boss, please ensure your reference number is entered in the â€˜Bank Referenceâ€™ field, or the receipt will be invalid. The official bank receipt must be uploaded within 24 hours. Losses due to ATM issues or fake receipts wonâ€™t be accepted. ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, sila pastikan nombor rujukan anda dimasukkan dalam ruangan â€˜Bank Referenceâ€™, kalau tidak resit tak sah. Resit rasmi bank perlu dimuat naik dalam masa 24 jam. Kerugian akibat masalah ATM atau resit palsu tidak akan diterima. ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: What is the minimum deposit amount?

languages.en: What is the minimum deposit amount?
languages.ms: Berapakah jumlah deposit minimum?

detailed.en: "Boss, for a standard deposit, the minimum is RM10. For an Instant Transfer, itâ€™s RM50. ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, untuk deposit standard, minimum ialah RM10. Untuk Pemindahan Segera, ia RM50. ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: Must withdrawals be made to my personal account?

languages.en: Must withdrawals be made to my personal account?
languages.ms: Adakah pengeluaran mesti dibuat ke akaun peribadi saya?

detailed.en: "Yes, boss! ğŸ˜Š Withdrawals can only be made to a bank account under your own name. Transfers to third-party accounts are not allowed!"
detailed.ms: "Ya, bos! ğŸ˜Š Pengeluaran hanya boleh dibuat ke akaun bank atas nama anda sendiri. Pindahan ke akaun pihak ketiga tidak dibenarkan!"

question.text: Boss, if the money I previously topped up into my wallet hasnâ€™t been used for betting, can I withdraw it?
variations: Bos, kalau duit yang saya topup ke dompet sebelum ni tak guna untuk pertaruhan, boleh tarik ke?
Boss, if the money I previously topped up into my wallet hasnâ€™t been used for betting, can I withdraw it?

languages.en: Can I withdraw deposited funds if I havenâ€™t placed any bets?
languages.ms: Bolehkah saya mengeluarkan dana deposit jika saya belum membuat pertaruhan?

detailed.en: "Sorry, boss, the top-up amount cannot be withdrawn. You need to place bets and win 30% before you can make a withdrawal! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Maaf, bos, jumlah topup tidak boleh ditarik keluar. Anda perlu membuat pertaruhan dan menang 30% sebelum boleh mengeluarkan! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: How long does it take for a withdrawal to be processed?

languages.en: How long does it take for a withdrawal to be processed?
languages.ms: Berapa lamakah masa yang diperlukan untuk memproses pengeluaran?

detailed.en: "Boss, withdrawal processing normally takes 5-30 minutes to complete. If itâ€™s not credited after 30 minutes, please inform us immediately! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, pemprosesan pengeluaran biasanya mengambil masa 5-30 minit untuk selesai. Jika belum masuk selepas 30 minit, sila maklumkan kepada kami segera! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: What is the minimum withdrawal amount?

languages.en: What is the minimum withdrawal amount?
languages.ms: Berapakah jumlah pengeluaran minimum?

detailed.en: "Boss, the minimum withdrawal amount is RM10! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, jumlah pengeluaran minimum ialah RM10! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: How can I confirm if my bet was placed successfully?

languages.en: How can I confirm if my bet was placed successfully?
languages.ms: Bagaimanakah saya boleh mengesahkan jika pertaruhan saya berjaya ditempatkan?

detailed.en: "Boss, please check your receipt for indicators like â€˜SOâ€™ (number sold out) or â€˜LMâ€™ (number restricted). If you see these, it means the bet wasnâ€™t successful! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, sila semak resit anda untuk tanda seperti â€˜SOâ€™ (nombor habis dijual) atau â€˜LMâ€™ (nombor dihadkan). Jika ada tanda ini, maksudnya pertaruhan tak berjaya! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: How are bets placed after 10:00 PM recorded?

languages.en: How are bets placed after 10:00 PM recorded?
languages.ms: Bagaimanakah pertaruhan selepas jam 10 malam direkodkan?

detailed.en: "Boss, bets placed after 10:00 PM will automatically be recorded for the next day! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, pertaruhan yang dibuat selepas jam 10 malam akan direkodkan secara automatik untuk hari berikutnya! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: How are winnings determined?

languages.en: How are winnings determined?
languages.ms: Bagaimanakah kemenangan ditentukan?

detailed.en: "Boss, winnings are determined based on the official system receipt. Any losses due to human errors, such as incorrect betting, are your responsibility! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, kemenangan ditentukan berdasarkan resit rasmi sistem. Sebarang kerugian akibat kesilapan manusia, seperti pertaruhan salah, adalah tanggungjawab anda! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: How does the company review abnormal betting activities?

languages.en: How does the company review abnormal betting activities?
languages.ms: Bagaimanakah syarikat menyemak aktiviti pertaruhan yang tidak normal?

detailed.en: "Boss, if we detect abnormal transactions like fraudulent behavior, the company reserves the right to void the ticket, even if results are already announced! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, jika kami kesan transaksi tidak normal seperti tingkah laku penipuan, syarikat berhak membatalkan tiket tersebut, walaupun keputusan sudah diumumkan! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: What are the cut-off times for lottery betting?

languages.en: What are the cut-off times for lottery betting?
languages.ms: Bilakah masa tamat untuk pertaruhan loteri?

detailed.en: "Boss, cut-off times depend on the lottery type: (M) MAGNUM: 7:00 PM on Wednesdays, Saturdays, Sundays, and special draw days (usually Tuesdays); (P) PMP: 7:00 PM on the same days; (T) TOTO: 7:00 PM; (S) SINGAPORE POOL: 6:25 PM on Wednesdays, Saturdays, and Sundays; (C) SARAWAK: 6:35 PM; (B) SABAH: 6:35 PM; (D) SANDAKAN: 6:35 PM; (H) GD LOTTO: 7:00 PM daily; (9) 9 LOTTO: 7:25 PM! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, masa tamat bergantung pada jenis loteri: (M) MAGNUM: 7:00 PM pada hari Rabu, Sabtu, Ahad dan hari cabutan khas (biasanya Selasa); (P) PMP: 7:00 PM pada hari yang sama; (T) TOTO: 7:00 PM; (S) SINGAPORE POOL: 6:25 PM pada Rabu, Sabtu, Ahad; (C) SARAWAK: 6:35 PM; (B) SABAH: 6:35 PM; (D) SANDAKAN: 6:35 PM; (H) GD LOTTO: 7:00 PM setiap hari; (9) 9 LOTTO: 7:25 PM! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.cn: "è€é—†ï¼Œå½©ç¥¨æŠ•æ³¨æˆªæ­¢æ™‚é–“ä¾é¡å‹è€Œå®šï¼š(M) MAGNUMï¼šæ˜ŸæœŸä¸‰ã€å…­ã€æ—¥åŠç‰¹åˆ¥æŠ½çæ—¥ï¼ˆé€šå¸¸æ˜ŸæœŸäºŒï¼‰æ™šä¸Š7:00ï¼›(P) PMPï¼šåŒæ—¥æ™šä¸Š7:00ï¼›(T) TOTOï¼šæ™šä¸Š7:00ï¼›(S) SINGAPORE POOLï¼šæ˜ŸæœŸä¸‰ã€å…­ã€æ—¥æ™šä¸Š6:25ï¼›(C) SARAWAKï¼šæ™šä¸Š6:35ï¼›(B) SABAHï¼šæ™šä¸Š6:35ï¼›(D) SANDAKANï¼šæ™šä¸Š6:35ï¼›(H) GD LOTTOï¼šæ¯å¤©æ™šä¸Š7:00ï¼›(9) 9 LOTTOï¼šæ™šä¸Š7:25å“¦ï¼ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: What do special markings on betting receipts mean?

languages.en: What do special markings on betting receipts mean?
languages.ms: Apa maksud penandaan khas pada resit pertaruhan?

detailed.en: "Boss, these markings show: SO means â€˜number sold outâ€™, LM means â€˜number restrictedâ€™, CR means â€˜insufficient balanceâ€™, and GC means â€˜betting time has endedâ€™! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, tanda-tanda ni bermaksud: SO ialah â€˜nombor habis dijualâ€™, LM ialah â€˜nombor dihadkanâ€™, CR ialah â€˜baki tidak mencukupiâ€™, dan GC ialah â€˜masa pertaruhan sudah tamatâ€™! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: What types of bets are available?

languages.en: What types of bets are available?
languages.ms: Apakah jenis-jenis pertaruhan yang tersedia?

detailed.en: "Boss, the available bet types are: BOX (All Reverse), IBOX (Full Coverage), RV (Reversible), BH (Head Reverse), and BT (Tail Reverse)! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, jenis pertaruhan yang ada ialah: BOX (All Reverse), IBOX (Full Coverage), RV (Reversible), BH (Head Reverse), dan BT (Tail Reverse)! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: What is IBOX (Full Coverage)?

languages.en: What is IBOX (Full Coverage)?
languages.ms: Apakah IBOX (Full Coverage)?

detailed.en: "Boss, IBOX (Full Coverage) covers all possible permutations, including duplicates. If any permutation matches the official draw, itâ€™s a win. It costs more but boosts your winning chances, though the individual prizes are lower! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, IBOX (Full Coverage) meliputi semua kemungkinan susunan, termasuk yang berulang. Jika mana-mana susunan sepadan dengan cabutan rasmi, ia dianggap menang. Kosnya lebih tinggi tetapi meningkatkan peluang menang, walaupun hadiah individu lebih rendah! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: What is a Big (å¤§) bet?

languages.en: What is a Big (å¤§) bet?
languages.ms: Apakah pertaruhan Big (besar)?

detailed.en: "Boss, a Big bet covers all prize categoriesâ€”1st, 2nd, 3rd, special, and consolation prizes. It gives you a higher chance of winning but with lower prize amounts per win! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, pertaruhan Big meliputi semua kategori hadiahâ€”pertama, kedua, ketiga, khas, dan hiburan. Ia beri peluang menang lebih tinggi tetapi jumlah hadiah setiap kemenangan lebih rendah! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: What is a Small (å°) bet?

languages.en: What is a Small (å°) bet?
languages.ms: Apakah pertaruhan Small (kecil)?

detailed.en: "Boss, a Small bet only covers the top three prizesâ€”1st, 2nd, and 3rdâ€”excluding special and consolation prizes. It offers higher prizes per win but a lower overall chance of winning! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, pertaruhan Small hanya meliputi tiga hadiah teratasâ€”pertama, kedua, dan ketigaâ€”tanpa hadiah khas dan hiburan. Hadiah per kemenangan lebih tinggi tetapi peluang menang keseluruhan lebih rendah! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: What is a 4A bet?

languages.en: What is a 4A bet?
languages.ms: Apakah pertaruhan 4A?

detailed.en: "Boss, a 4A bet is exclusive to 4D games and focuses only on the 1st prize number. It offers the highest prize but has the lowest chance of winning! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, pertaruhan 4A khusus untuk permainan 4D dan hanya bertaruh pada nombor hadiah pertama. Ia menawarkan hadiah tertinggi tetapi peluang menang paling rendah! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: Provide a comparison of Big, Small, and 4A bets.

languages.en: Provide a comparison of Big, Small, and 4A bets.
languages.ms: Berikan perbandingan antara pertaruhan Big, Small dan 4A.

detailed.en: "Boss, Big bets give you a high chance of winning with lower prize amounts; Small bets offer medium winning chances with higher prizes; 4A bets have the lowest winning probability but provide the highest prize! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, pertaruhan Big beri peluang menang tinggi dengan hadiah lebih rendah; pertaruhan Small tawarkan peluang menang sederhana dengan hadiah lebih tinggi; pertaruhan 4A ada peluang menang paling rendah tapi hadiah tertinggi! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: How do I choose between Big, Small, and 4A bets?

languages.en: How do I choose between Big, Small, and 4A bets?
languages.ms: Bagaimanakah saya memilih antara pertaruhan Big, Small dan 4A?

detailed.en: "Boss, if you want higher winning chances with lower prizes, go for Big. If youâ€™re aiming for higher prizes and can take more risk, pick Small. For betting only on the 1st prize with the highest payout, choose 4A! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, jika anda mahu peluang menang lebih tinggi dengan hadiah rendah, pilih Big. Jika anda sasarkan hadiah lebih besar dan boleh ambil risiko, ambil Small. Untuk pertaruhan hanya pada hadiah pertama dengan bayaran tertinggi, pilih 4A! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: What is BOX (All Reverse)?

languages.en: What is BOX (All Reverse)?
languages.ms: Apakah BOX (All Reverse)?

detailed.en: "Boss, BOX (All Reverse) generates only reverse or partial arrangements, making it a more affordable betting option! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, BOX (All Reverse) hanya menghasilkan susunan terbalik atau sebahagian, jadi ia pilihan pertaruhan yang lebih murah! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: Which lotteries qualify for MAGIC BOX?

languages.en: Which lotteries qualify for MAGIC BOX?
languages.ms: Loteri mana yang layak untuk MAGIC BOX?

detailed.en: "Boss, only lotteries marked with (M), (P), (T), (S), (C), (B), (D), (H), and (9) qualify for MAGIC BOX! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, hanya loteri yang ditandakan dengan (M), (P), (T), (S), (C), (B), (D), (H), dan (9) layak untuk MAGIC BOX! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: How can I receive MAGIC LETTER rewards?

languages.en: How can I receive MAGIC LETTER rewards?
languages.ms: Bagaimanakah saya boleh menerima ganjaran MAGIC LETTER?

detailed.en: "Boss, the system will automatically grant MAGIC LETTER rewards to qualifying bets that exceed 1 unit per ticket! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, sistem akan secara automatik memberikan ganjaran MAGIC LETTER kepada pertaruhan yang layak melebihi 1 unit setiap tiket! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: How can I check MAGIC BOX odds and rules?

languages.en: How can I check MAGIC BOX odds and rules?
languages.ms: Bagaimanakah saya boleh menyemak peraturan dan peluang MAGIC BOX?

detailed.en: "Boss, please contact our customer support for detailed information on MAGIC BOX odds and rules! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, sila hubungi sokongan pelanggan kami untuk maklumat terperinci mengenai peluang dan peraturan MAGIC BOX! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: Can I cancel a bet after placing it?

languages.en: Can I cancel a bet after placing it?
languages.ms: Bolehkah saya membatalkan pertaruhan selepas menempatkannya?

detailed.en: "Boss, yes, you can cancel a bet within 30 minutes of placing it! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, boleh, anda boleh membatalkan pertaruhan dalam masa 30 minit selepas ditempatkan! ğŸ˜Š"

question.text: Boss, how do I change my password?
variations: Bos, macam mana nak tukar kata laluan?
Boss, how do I change my password?

languages.en: How can I change my password?
languages.ms: Macam mana saya boleh tukar kata laluan saya?

detailed.en: "Boss, to change your password, please tap the bottom right corner to open your profile, select â€˜Update Password,â€™ enter your current password, and then set a new one! ğŸ˜Š"
detailed.ms: "Bos, untuk menukar kata laluan, sila tekan sudut kanan bawah untuk buka profil anda, pilih â€˜Kemas Kini Kata Laluan,â€™ masukkan kata laluan semasa, dan tetapkan yang baru! ğŸ˜Š"
